document.title: Reference for `eif_string'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_plug. h" EIF_REFERENCE eif_string (char * string );
2DESCRIPTION The eif_string() macro returns the corresponding Eiffel string corresponding to the C string string. The return value does not reference string.
2NOTES This function return an Eiffel reference, which must be protected with eif_protect().
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 5 and later.
2COMPATIBILITY
eif_string() is equivalent to RTMS(), which is deprecated.
2SEE ALSO
eif_protect(1) , eif_create(1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
